english_example_sentence: You will be able to touch this soft fabric with your small hands.
russian_example_sentence: Вы сможете прикоснуться к этой мягкой ткани своими маленькими руками.
turkish_example_sentence: Siz, bu yumuşak kumaşa küçük ellerinizle dokunabileceksiniz.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Siz, bu yumuşak kumaşa küçük ellerinizle ______.
